Class ApiaryHivesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiary.ApiaryHivesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ApiaryContract.ApiaryHivesView, HivesAdapter.HiveItemListener, BaseTabFragment, BaseView<ApiaryContract.Presenter>

    public class ApiaryHivesFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements BaseTabFragment, ApiaryContract.ApiaryHivesView, HivesAdapter.HiveItemListener
    Display a list of hives.
